attributes.action: immediately replace the new logo for the 2012 Olympic Games in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new brand "identity" for the London Olympic Games is a disastrous development. The logo unveiled today is woeful, dire - and completely undermines the creative, uplifting spirit of the original London bid. Some pretentious design consultancy is, no doubt, laughing all the way to the bank.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
